description.displayText: I have known Alla for over 10 years. During the time that I have known Alla, I have found Alla to be honest, trustworthy, talented and gifted. She is one of the most dedicated, hardworking and loyal people that I have ever known. She cares deeply for her family, friends and students with whom she works with. I am confident that Alla would be an asset to any employer.
description.originalText: I have known Alla for over 10 years. During the time that I have known Alla, I have found Alla to be honest, trustworthy, talented and gifted. She is one of the most dedicated, hardworking and loyal people that I have ever known. She cares deeply for her family, friends and students with whom she works with. I am confident that Alla would be an asset to any employer.

description.displayText: Alla is one of the most conscientious people I know. She is kindhearted, giving, thoughtful; she works hard and goes above and beyond to deliver only the best in terms of her services, creations and care. She is the type of person that will leave a space making it better than how she found it. I admire her work ethic and her tenacity and know that she would be an asset to any organization or employer.
description.originalText: Alla is one of the most conscientious people I know. She is kindhearted, giving, thoughtful; she works hard and goes above and beyond to deliver only the best in terms of her services, creations and care. She is the type of person that will leave a space making it better than how she found it. I admire her work ethic and her tenacity and know that she would be an asset to any organization or employer.

description.displayText: Alla was in charge of my children during their most difficult time, and I cannot thank her enough. Whether it was activities, homework, or an extra nudge, she was there for my kids throughout the years a my right hand I couldn't have gone without. She brings to the table that "extra" care and empathy, enriched our life with her linguistic skills, and I truly believe my children have become better people because of her. My work schedule being so erratic, I was fortunate to have Alla as my trusted ally. My kids are now grown and wonderful, well rounded humans and I honestly couldn't have done it without her.
